body_html:
@fmassa I can do that , but my post may become closed again due to duplication since I already asked it in the discussion forum (Link)
it does not do anything fancier than roi pooling, i just have difficulty in the backward pass. If you find the time can you please take a look at my question here and lemme know what you think

body:
@fmassa I can do that , but my post may become closed again due to duplication since I already asked it in the discussion forum ([Link](https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/how-to-deal-with-backward-pass-in-pytorch-version-of-roi-pooling/28304))
it does not do anything fancier than roi pooling, i just have difficulty in the backward pass. If you find the time can you please take a look at my question [here](https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/how-to-deal-with-backward-pass-in-pytorch-version-of-roi-pooling/28304) and lemme know what you think
